entry.string: Hint : empty the Label to delete a property for all items
entry.translation: Heent: impty zee Lebel tu delete-a a pruperty fur ell items

entry.string:
Warning ! This is a system object used internally by the Dynamic Data module.

Trying to modify the properties of this object may break the Dynamic Data module.
Proceed with caution...
entry.translation:
Verneeng! Thees is a system oobject used internelly by zee Dynemeec Deta mudoole-a.

Tryeeng tu mudeeffy zee pruperteees ooff thees oobject mey breek zee Dynemeec Deta mudoole-a.
Pruceed veet cooshun...

entry.string: Note : for completely dynamic Objects like this one, you need to define one property that is of type "Item ID"
entry.translation: Nute-a: fur cumpletely dynemeec Oobjects leeke-a thees oone-a, yuoo need tu deffeene-a oone-a pruperty thet is ooff type-a "Item ID"

entry.string: When DD is used to extend some item (e.g. roles), then you should definitely avoid re-using property names that are already in the original item - just like you can't have 2 fields called 'state' in "static" items either. You should also avoid 'module', 'itemtype', 'itemid', 'transform' and 'returnurl' when using DD via hooks, because those are pre-defined parameters in hook calls.
entry.translation: Vhee DD is used tu ixtend sume-a item (i.g. rules), zeen yuoo shuoold deffeenitely efueed re-a-useeng pruperty nemes thet ere-a elreedy in zee ooreeginel item - joost leeke-a yuoo cun't hefe-a 2 feeelds celled 'stete' in "steteec" items ieezeer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Yuoo shuoold elsu efueed 'module', 'itemtype', 'itemid', 'transform' und 'returnurl' vhee useeng DD feea huuks, becoose-a thuse-a ere-a pre-a-deffeened peremeters in huuk cells. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Hint : after you create a property, the label and name are independent from each other. You can adapt the property name by clicking on the ID link above.
entry.translation: Heent: effter yuoo creete-a a pruperty, zee lebel und neme-a ere-a independent frum iech oozeer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Yuoo cun edept zee pruperty neme-a by cleecking oon zee ID leenk ebufe-a.
